views.markdown:
Supports iOS 10

Thanks to Sticktron for the concept.

This tweaks shows your remaining certificate time on yalu/mach_portal app icon.

compatible with Apex 2.

NOTE : Some SpringBoard tweaks (especially icon modding tweaks) conflict with this. If you found please report immediately.

Configure options from Settings.

-timezone bug fix and other bug fixes. -fixed crash and all known bugs.
-Added Settings.
-Added Support for every app.(select from settings).
-rewrote entire resigning code.Hopefully this will fix all resigning issue

-ONLY SUPPORTS OFFICIAL YALU AND MACH FROM qwertyoruiop AS OF NOW.

-fixed cert not updating after resigning.
-fixed blank label
-fixed cert time delay due to time zone differences.
-perfomance improvement.
